title: Centers of Excellence (COEs)
content:
Both BCBSIL and UHC require you to use their COEs for specific procedures, which are noted on the previous page. Company A also offers a separate Carrum Health Medical and Surgery Benefit that offers access to Centers of Excellence for other types of procedures.
